fe_uat.select_query: SELECT * FROM b2c_audit_log WHERE (:jsid IS NULL OR JSESSION_ID LIKE :jsid) AND STATR_TIME BETWEEN :start_time AND :end_time ORDER BY ID DESC

fe_pd.select_query: SELECT * FROM b2c_audit_log WHERE (:jsid IS NULL OR JSESSION_ID LIKE :jsid) AND STATR_TIME BETWEEN :start_time AND :end_time ORDER BY ID DESC

magento_uat.select_query: SELECT * FROM outbound_call_log WHERE (:backend_system IS NULL OR backend_system = :backend_system) AND (:channel IS NULL OR channel = :channel) AND created_at BETWEEN :start_time AND :end_time ORDER BY id DESC

magento_pd.select_query: SELECT * FROM outbound_call_log WHERE (:backend_system IS NULL OR backend_system = :backend_system) AND (:channel IS NULL OR channel = :channel) AND created_at BETWEEN :start_time AND :end_time ORDER BY id DESC

selfcare_uat.select_query: SELECT * FROM test_transactions_logger WHERE (:sc_transaction_id IS NULL OR SC_TRANSACTION_ID = :sc_transaction_id) AND AUDIT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN :start_time AND :end_time ORDER BY AUDIT_TIMESTAMP DESC

selfcare_pd.select_query: SELECT * FROM test_transactions_lgr_be WHERE (:transaction_id IS NULL OR TRANSACTION_ID = :transaction_id) AND AUDIT_TIMESTAMP BETWEEN :start_time AND :end_time ORDER BY AUDIT_TIMESTAMP DESC
